channel.title: Form Designer :: Fusion CAC Documentation
channel.description: The form designer is used to create worksheets for CDI, Coders, Shared Worksheets, Physician Coder, Documentation Review Forms and Query templates. A “Shared Worksheet” is a worksheet that can be used by both CDI Specialists and Coders, unlike “CDI Worksheet” and “Coder Worksheet” which are exclusive to CDI and Coding, respectively. Forms are used to collect data and/or take notes. For example, CDI Worksheets are used for a CDI to document their thoughts while reviewing a chart.
